named-query.name: READ_PAYMENT_SOURCES_BY_PERSON_ID
named-query.query: SELECT ps FROM com.mpower.domain.PaymentSource ps WHERE ps.person.id = :personId ORDER BY ps.type

named-query.name: READ_ACTIVE_PAYMENT_SOURCES_BY_PERSON_ID
named-query.query: SELECT ps FROM com.mpower.domain.PaymentSource ps WHERE ps.person.id = :personId AND ps.active = true ORDER BY ps.type

named-query.name: UPDATE_PAYMENT_SOURCE_TO_INACTIVE
named-query.query: UPDATE com.mpower.domain.PaymentSource ps SET ps.active = false WHERE ps.id = :paymentSourceId

named-query.name: READ_GIFTS_BY_PAYMENT_SOURCE_ID
named-query.query: SELECT gift FROM com.mpower.domain.Gift gift WHERE gift.paymentSource.id = :paymentSourceId
